metadata.synopsis: One-liner telling players to put the artefact in the Planecaster
metadata.how_to_trigger: Dialog set on Laezel while she's waiting at the Planecaster

0.speaker: Lae'zel
0.text: Insert the artefact - or I take it from your corpse. This is the way forward.

1.speaker: Lae'zel
1.text: Place the artefact in the planecaster. I'm waiting.
